description: This file provides a centralized API client and various mock functions for user authentication, dashboard data retrieval, session and message management, and administrative operations in a Next.js frontend application.

methods.name: async function request<T>( request
methods.description: Generic function to perform HTTP requests with retries and error handling.

methods.name: export async function login(_body: LoginReq): Promise<{ token: string; role: "student" | "mentor/ login
methods.description: Mocks user login process by assigning roles based on email prefix.

methods.name: export async function register(body: RegisterReq): Promise<{ ok: boolean }> { register
methods.description: Mocks user registration; does not send data to backend in mock mode.

methods.name: export async function getAdminDashboard(): Promise<{ users: number; departments: number; activeS/ getAdminDashboard
export async function getMentorDashboard(): Promise<{ getMentorDashboard
methods.description: Retrieves mock mentor dashboard data including trends, distribution, and top students.

methods.name: export async function listStudentSessions(): Promise<Session[]> { listStudentSessions
methods.description: Returns a list of mock student session summaries.

methods.name: export async function createSession(): Promise<{ id: string }> { createSession
methods.description: Creates a new mock session and returns its ID.

methods.name: export async function getSessionMessages(sessionId: string): Promise<Message[]> { getSessionMessages
methods.description: Fetches messages for a given session, mock data.

methods.name: export async function sendMessage( sendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message and returns a mock reply, attempts to use internal API.

methods.name: export async function uploadMaterial(_files: Array<{ name: string; size: number }>): Promise<{ o/ uploadMaterial
methods.description: Mocks uploading files, calls internal API.

methods.name: export async function getStreak(): Promise<{ current: number; best: number }> { getStreak
export async function listUsers(): Promise<Array<{ id: string; name: string; email: string; role/ listUsers
export async function createUser(body: { name: string; email: string; role: string }): Promise<{/ createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user in mock mode.

methods.name: export async function deleteUser(id: string): Promise<{ ok: boolean }> { deleteUser
methods.description: Deletes a user by ID in mock mode.

methods.name: export async function listDepartments(): Promise<Array<{ id: string; name: string }>> { listDepartments
export async function createDepartment(body: { name: string }): Promise<{ ok: boolean }> { createDepartment
methods.description: Creates a new department, mock implementation.

methods.name: export async function deleteDepartment(id: string): Promise<{ ok: boolean }> { deleteDepartment
methods.description: Deletes a department by ID, mock.
